org.jboss.elemento

Interface Attachable


  • public interface Attachable
    Interface to get notified when an element has been attached / detached from the DOM.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attach(elemental2.dom.MutationRecord mutationRecord)
      Called if the element has been attached.
      default void detach(elemental2.dom.MutationRecord mutationRecord)
      Called if the element has been detached.
      static void register(elemental2.dom.HTMLElement element, Attachable attachable)
      Registers the specified element for both attach and detach.
      static <E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement>
      void      		 register(IsElement<E> element, Attachable attachable)
      Registers the specified element for both attach and detach.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        static void register(elemental2.dom.HTMLElement element,
                     Attachable attachable)
        Registers the specified element for both attach and detach.

      • register

        static <E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement> void register(IsElement<E> element,
                                                            Attachable attachable)
        Registers the specified element for both attach and detach.

      • attach

        void attach(elemental2.dom.MutationRecord mutationRecord)
        Called if the element has been attached.

      • detach

        default void detach(elemental2.dom.MutationRecord mutationRecord)
        Called if the element has been detached. Default implementation does nothing.
